column5: AFTER YESTERDAYS TOUGH GO I KNEW MY LUCK WOULD HAVE TO CHANGE WHEN THE WATER CLEARED ABIT MORE. AND THAT IT DID. NOT GONNA BRAG NUMBERS BUT I WILL SAY ONE OF THE BEST STEELHEADING DAYS I HAVE HAD. ONE HOLE WAS JUST STUFFED WITH THEM. AND THE BEST PART NOT ANOTHER SOUL IN SIGHT. HOW OFTEN DOES THAT HAPPEN ON A WEEKEND LOL RAN OUT OF ROE BY 10AM AND SWITCHED UP TO MY RIVERWOOD JIGS. GOD I LOVE THOSE THINGS. WELL 5 DAYS TILL WIFE BACK FROM MEXICO WITH MY CAMERA LOL TILL THEN SORRY JUST WORDS  LOL
Come pick me up and I'll bring my camera (and fishing stuff )
Ya got to love those days eh Scott.  Nice catch,n.
Thanks for sharing CC! Looks like I need to brave the elements and get off the computer.
Sounds like a great day out. Nice.
